page.title: 09Local Industry,Apple Growing
page.content: In our area of Somerset,apple growing provides seasonal employment to local women.My Mum works at a fruit_farm from September to April.For the rest of the year she is out of work.The apples are picked in the Autumn.They are put into large bins and then put into cold_store to keep fresh. One_by_one the bins are removed and the apples washed.In a special machine the leaves and twigs are removed and then the apples are ready for grading.Undersized apples are used to make cider.The apples are then packed into boxes and returned to the cold_store.Class 1 apples are sent to all parts of the country and especially to London.In the Winter the trees are pruned to ensure a good crop the following year.
